Source: Calculated from Rustenburg (https://www.chrometco.co.za/sites/default/files/Chrometco%20Fact%20Sheet%202012.pdf). The Rooderand Project is located on the Western Limb of the Bushveld Igneous Complex, approximately 60 km northwest of Rustenburg

web_search_companies.notes: Chrometco Limited is focused on chrome exploration and mining, and has entered into an agreement with International Ferro Metals for mining operations.
